document.full_text: switzerland has received two appeals in the ubs tax case, a judicial official said, just weeks after 500 americans were notified that their data was to be sent to the u.s. justice department.
document.title: swiss report first appeals filed in ubs tax case
lines_and_colors: switzerland has received two appeals in the ubs tax case, a judicial official said, just weeks after 500 americans were notified that their data was to be sent to the u.s. justice department.
